business.headline: Earning up to Rs 12.75 lakh? Why you should opt for new income tax regimeEarlier, taxpayers earning up to Rs 7 lakh paid nil taxes under the new regime. Now that limit has been raised to Rs 12 lakh.

Sensex tanks 800 points: 3 reasons why stock market is falling todayThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 676.83 points to 74,634.23, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 203.05 points to 22,592.85 as of 10 AM. IT stocks were the worst hit, with HCLTech falling nearly 3%.
Stock market opens in red: Sensex down 700 points. HCLTech falls 3%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 672.83 points to 74,638.23, while the NSE Nifty50 shed 216.80 points to 22,579.10 as of 9:40 AM.

FII selling dampens investor sentiment on Dalal Street: When will it stop? Foreign institutional investors (FII) have been on a selling spree which has hampered investor sentiment on Dalal Street, affecting Sensex and Nifty as they are moving funds to other markets.

Quality Power IPO listing: Will it make a strong market debut? Check latest GMPQuality Power IPO opened for subscription on February 14, 2025, aiming to raise Rs 858.70 crore. The public issue consisted of a fresh issue of 53 lakh shares worth Rs 225 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.49 crore shares worth Rs 633.70 crore.

Meta rewards executives with 200% bonuses despite ongoing job cutsThe bonus for top executives was increased to 200% from 75% and the decision was approved by Meta's Compensation, Nominating, and Governance Committee (CNGC) after recent layoff.

Health insurance: 4 tips to reduce premiums for senior citizens Purchasing a health insurance policy at a younger age can help in securing reduced premium rates. Generally, lower insurance premiums are offered to younger people as they are considered low risk.

Index Funds vs. ETFs: 5 key things every investor should know Exchange-Traded Funds are traded like shares on the stock market and can be sold or purchased at existing market prices during the day, while Index Funds are traded only once at the closure of the share market.

ICMAI demands 'accountant' status for cost accountants in new Income Tax BillIn its memorandum, ICMAI highlighted the extensive training of Cost and Management Accountants (CMAs), which includes expertise in taxation, finance, auditing, corporate laws, and strategic risk management.

New tax regime: 3 deductions that can help taxpayers maximise savings  Though the new regime offered concessional tax rates, it reduced several popular deductions and exemptions, like HRA, LTA, interest on home loans, Section 80C, and more.

AI to take centre stage at the 3rd Digital News Publishers Association ConclaveThrough various keynote sessions, panel discussions and expert presentations, this year's DNPA Conclave aims to decode various critical issues, future strategies, opportunities and models that can power an equitable, inclusive and sustainable digital media ecosystem in an era of rapid technological advancement.
AMFI launches Chhoti SIP, Tarun Yojana, and MITRA. All you need to knowThe latest initiative by AMFI reinforces its goal of making mutual fund investments accessible to all investors across India.

entertainment.headline: Zero Day review: Star power can't save this weakly executed political dramaReleased-Thu Feb 20, 2025Zero Day, directed by Lesli Linka Glatter, is a political drama featuring a stellar cast including Robert De Niro and Angela Bassett. While the performances are strong, the series struggles with plot depth and resolution.

Watch: Jennie and Doechii bring the heat with ExtraL ahead of RubyJennie and Doechii are making waves with their latest collaboration, ExtraL. As Jennie gears up for her solo debut with the album Ruby, fans can expect a bold new chapter in her musical journey.

Complaint against Munawar Faruqui for 'insulting religion' on Hafta Vasooli showComedian Munawar Faruqui landed in legal trouble after a complaint was filed against him for hurting religious sentiments through his show, Hafta Vasooli. The advocate shared a copy of the complaint on X.

'Mismatched' actor Prajakta Koli shares dreamy pics from her mehndiContent creator and actor Prajakta Koli has started her pre-wedding celebrations with a vibrant mehndi ceremony. She shared joyful moments with her fiance Vrishank Khanal and family on social media.

Honey Singh's Millionaire concert in Mumbai showed what grand comebacks look likeYo Yo Honey Singh made a powerful return to the stage in Mumbai, captivating fans with his energy and heartfelt messages. His performance was a testament to his resilience and dedication to the art.

Samay Raina recalls what he asked Tanmay Bhat after India's Got Latent controversyComedian Samay Raina addresses the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's inappropriate remark on his show, India's Got Latent, during his tour in Canada. He recalled what he had asked Tanmay Bhat after the controversy erupted.
Honey Singh's jibe at Raftaar, Badshah: People say they'll write my destinyHoney Singh took a direct dig at fellow artists Badshah and Raftaar at the first Millionaire India Tour stop in Mumbai.

Watch: Honey Singh's take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi Aa Gaya Oye'Honey Singh launched his Millionaire India Tour in Mumbai, delivering a captivating performance that engaged a sold-out audience. He shared his take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi aa gays oye', emphasising unity among diverse Indian communities.

Watch: Honey Singh kicks off Millionaire tour with a grand Mumbai showRapper Honey Singh launched his Millionaire Tour with a spectacular concert in Mumbai. The show featured dramatic entrances and a lineup of energetic performances.

Undercover High School X review: Fans give thumbs up to Seo Kang-joon's K-dramaUndercover High School, featuring Seo Kang-joon and Jin Ki-joo, has premiered on MBC TV. The series, praised for its engaging storyline, follows an undercover NIS agent as a high school student.

Rapper Diddy's attorney withdraws from case: Under no circumstances can I continueAnthony Ricco, representing Sean 'Diddy' Combs, has filed to withdraw from the federal case citing reasons protected by attorney-client privilege. Ricco had once defended Osama bin Laden.

Buried Hearts review: Park Hyung-sik commands attention in his darkest roleReleased-Sat Feb 22, 2025The Korean drama Buried Hearts will captivate viewers with its blend of intense emotions and high-stakes drama. The series, featuring Park Hyung-sik, explores the complex dynamics of corporate intrigue and personal survival. Read the full review.

general news.headline: Telangana tunnel collapse: Fading hope for survivors, 40 metres left to goAs hope diminishes of survival of the eight people trapped inside a collapsed tunnel, rescue operations intensified with specialised machinery being brought in to reach the final distance to those trapped inside.

Uddhav Thackeray, cousin Raj's smiling photos spark strong reunion buzzRecent photos of Uddhav Thackeray, his wife Rashmi Thackeray and Raj Thackeray at a wedding together have sparked a strong reunion buzz between the Thackeray cousins after two decades of split.

How Virat Kohli conquered his spin demons to demolish Pakistan in DubaiStar India batter Virat Kohli was seen at his vintage best, playing a match-winning innings of 100* (111) against Pakistan in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. The batting stalwart had to conquer his spin demons to rise above the odds and script another masterful chase for the Men in Blue.

Punjabi Trump song got Indians deported from US, claim posts. Here's whyThe Punjabi song Trump, which boasts of illegal immigration to the US, was uploaded on YouTube 6 months ago and used in reels by those crossing into the US illegally. With the Trump administration now sending back illegal immigrants, Indians are claiming in hilarious posts that the US President started deporting Indians after listening to the Punjabi song. Even Diljit Dosanjh recently referred to the Trump song, which has 54 million views.

High-level panel to resolve Tejas delivery delays after air chief's rap: SourcesThe five-member committee, led by Defence Secretary Rajesh Kumar Singh, has been tasked with identifying bottlenecks in the LCA programme and recommending measures to accelerate production.

PM Modi taps Omar Abdullah, Anand Mahindra, other celebs for anti-obesity drivePM Modi had, in his 'Mann Ki Baat' address on Sunday urged people to use less oil in food and also pass on the challenge of reducing oil intake by 10 per cent to 10 others.

Pakistani fans in meltdown after crushing Champions Trophy defeat to India. See tweetsIndia secured a 6-wicket victory, pushing tournament hosts Pakistan closer to an early exit after heavy defeats in their first two matches.
Feeling tired? But is it your body fatigue or mind?We often brush off fatigue as just physical tiredness, but is that really the case?

LPU's 2025 Batch Final Year Student Bags Rs 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) Placement Package-Betireddy Naga Vamsi Reddy B. Tech student has secured a 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) package with an AI robotics company and is set to graduate in May 2025. 

-Over 1,700 students have received packages ranging from Rs 10 LPA – Rs 1 Crore per annum 

-1,912 students received multiple job offers while Adireddy Vasu, secured 7 job offers, setting a rare and impressive record.

Death, taxes and Virat Kohli 100: Pakistan trolled after embarrassing India lossThe Pakistan cricket team was massively trolled after their embarrassing loss to India in the Champions Trophy on Sunday, February 23. Pakistan have now lost 2 in 2 and face early exit from the competition.
INDIA bloc-ked? The Opposition front as a grand illusionMost respondents to INDIA TODAY's Mood of the Nation poll value a strong Opposition even as doubts mount over the front's leadership and unity

Ukraine-Russia war 3 years on: Trump's dramatic policy shift rattles worldOn February 24, 2022, Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered a "special military operation" to "demilitarise and denazify" Ukraine, claiming that his nation had no intention to occupy its neighbour. Three years on, the war continues with hundreds of thousands killed, injured and displaced on both sides.

Pakistan can still qualify for semis despite defeat to India. Here's how Champions Trophy: Placed at the bottom of the table in Group A, Pakistan need a miracle and plenty of equations to go in their favour for a berth in the semi-final. On Sunday, Pakistan lost to India by six wickets in Dubai.
Elon Musk's SpaceX to launch Starship Super Heavy on FridayThe Starship Super Heavy is a two-stage launch vehicle comprising the Super Heavy booster and the Starship spacecraft.

Chhaava box office Day 10: Vicky Kaushal's biggest hit yet storms past Rs 325 croreVicky Kaushal's Chhaava earned Rs 40 crore on Day 10, bringing its total to Rs 326.75 crore. Despite seeing a slight dip due to the India vs Pakistan match on Sunday, the film continued to shine at the box office.

Video: Trump fumes over Taliban in over-the-top 'angry' rantAt CPAC in Maryland, Donald Trump grabbed attention with his exaggerated repetition of "angry" while lamenting US military equipment left in Afghanistan.

Delhi Police's hilarious dig at Pakistan after India's mega Champions Trophy winAs social media users posted memes and jokes mocking Pakistan's performance, Delhi Police joined in with a witty remark.

Video: Delhi-bound US flight escorted by fighter jets to Rome after bomb hoaxAn American Airlines flight from New York to New Delhi was diverted to Rome due to a security concern later deemed non-credible. The aircraft landed safely, underwent inspection, and will resume its journey on Monday.

Mohanlal, Shreya Ghoshal, R Madhavan among 10 nominated by PM Modi to fight obesityIn his 'Mann Ki Baat' session on Sunday, PM Narendra Modi presented data and informed his fellow Indians about how one in every eight people is struggling with obesity in the country. He then nominated 10 prominent people from across fields to contribute to the mission.

SAG Awards 2025: Timothee Chalamet, Demi Moore, Selena Gomez among top winnersThe 31st Annual SAG Awards in Los Angeles celebrated exceptional performances in film and television. Take a look at the winners here.

Akshay Kumar visits Maha Kumbh ahead of Mahashivratri. WatchAkshay Kumar visited Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj and took a holy dip at the Triveni Sangam. His visit comes days before Maha Kumbh's conclusion on Mahashivratri, February 26.

Did Virat Kohli call Anushka Sharma after India's win? Fans think soAfter India's win against Pakistan, Virat Kohli was seen on a video call, presumably with Anushka Sharma and their kids. Anushka later celebrated his century and India's win on Instagram.

sports.headline: Shoaib Akhtar slams Pakistan: It is a brainless, clueless team managementPakistan are all but out of the Champions Trophy 2025 after their limp defeat to India. Legendary fast bowler Shoaib Akhtar lashed out at the team, highlighting the lack of winning culture. Virat Kohli's unbeaten 100 handed Pakistan a six-wicket hammering in Dubai on Sunday.

Virat Kohli deserves to be called 'King', not Babar Azam: Ex-Pakistan captainFormer Pakistan captain Mohammad Hafeez has slammed the spokesperson of Babar Azam, who hype the player on social media. Hafeez has said that if anyone deserves the title of 'King' it is Virat Kohli.

We should talk about Virat Kohli: Mohammad RizwanPakistan captain Mohammad Rizwan lauded Virat Kohli's match-winning century against his team, shutting down critics of the Indian batter before even addressing Pakistan's defeat. With this loss, Pakistan's hopes of reaching the Champions Trophy semi-finals came to an end.

His consistent performances have solidified his place as India's No. 4 ahead of the Champions Trophy semi-finals.

Bangladesh ready for do-or-die clash against New Zealand: Phill SimonsBangladesh head coach Phil Simmons emphasised that his side is all geared up to face off in a do-or-die Champions Trophy clash against New Zealand on February 24. He highlighted how his side has had good training sessions in build up to the crucial Group A clash.

Shreyas Iyer provides a crucial update on the players after their second group stage game in Dubai.

IND vs PAK: Hardik delivers a Bumrah-esque performance to win over fansHardik Pandya was an unsung hero for India during their win against Pakistan as he played the role of Jasprit Bumrah during the match. Hardik picked up the wickets of Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan.

Watch: Kohli fans in Islamabad celebrate batter's century vs PakistanVirat Kohli's brilliance transcends rivalries, as Pakistan fans cheered his century during India's Champions Trophy win. The star batter's 51st ODI ton anchored India's dominant chase, proving yet again why he's adored worldwide.

Shreyas Iyer credits 'adaptability' for Dubai heroics vs PakistanIndia's Shreyas Iyer stressed the importance of adaptability in high-pressure matches, especially against rivals like Pakistan. Demonstrating this approach, he played a vital knock, scoring a crucial fifty and forging a game-changing 114-run partnership with century-maker Virat Kohli in Dubai.

India vs Pakistan clash breaks viewership record on JioHotstarThe India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy match broke records on JioHotstar on Sunday, February 23. According to news agency PTI, 60.2 corer people viewed the match just on the streaming platform.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
